participant_1.background:
I spend time with my dogs, which helps me feel better.
I'd brag about using my fame to advocate for animal welfare and conservation.
My cats and I love the rainy weather in Portland!
last month the farm was foreclosed so i am looking for a new job.
I wake up, eat breakfast, and practice my cooking before work.

participant_2.background:
I am not rich, but I am happy with my life.
i spend my free time volunteering at nursing homes.
My dog is my best friend, so I'd love to have lunch with him and learn some new tricks to teach him.
I'll probably spend too much time watching YouTube videos of my favorite bands when I'm home.
I am too strict with my soldiers, sometimes I make them do things that are too dangerous.

content.text: What do you do for a living?
I am a soldier in the army.
Oh, that sounds cool! Do you enjoy it?
I do, it is a great way to serve my country.
That's nice. I am looking for a new job. My farm was foreclosed last month.
Oh no, that is terrible. I am so sorry to hear that.
It's okay. I am going to keep my head up and look for a new job.
I am sure you will find a great job. You seem very smart and capable.
What kind of jobs are you interested in?
I am interested in anything in the culinary field. I love to cook.
Oh, that is great. I love to cook too.
What is your favorite food to cook?
I love to make pasta dishes.
Me too! I love making pasta carbonara.
That is one of my favorites too!
